Any act compromising its future health or structural integrity;
Any act detrimental to its overall aesthetics;

Any act inconsistent with Best Management Practices.

Major Pruning not done in conformance with a Major Pruning Permit.
Removal means:

Tree Protection Plan means a written plan for the preservation of Protected
